lines.text:
[narrating]
I was as interested in girls as any other guy. But when it came down to the big act of intercourse, well, I just get cold feet. It wasn't so much that I worry about not being good enough or knowing enough. It was about not caring enough. I ran into girls who would just expect guys to be turned on, like a switch. I wasn't. I couldn't. Maybe I was watching too many old movies late at night on the tube. It was always really romantic. I don't know. Real life wasn't working out like that.
